page.title: 17HACKLINGE AREA SUPERNATURAL.
page.content: It appears that if a man and his dog could be seen sitting on one of the bridges in Mill Lane anyone seeing and passing them would find as they crossed the next bridge that the same man and his dog could be seen sitting on that bridge also. A medium had to be forcibly restrained after going into a trance near Ham Church. A young village child saw, on two occasions, a "mad lady with flowers" inside the church and the crying of a child has been heard coming from the church. A Grey Lady has been seen wandering in the church- yard. She is said to be looking for a child who drowned while in her care. It is a fact that a child buried in the church was "murdered by her nurse" who was later hanged at Maidstone and that even on the hottest day the church sometimes feels icy cold.
